RECEIVED
RADIO STATION
MAY 27 ' i 4 Ai'i Iks memobandoti
' WILL a WIUC
"UNIVERSITY OF ILL INF'S
Way 23, 1958
To: NAJSB Board of Directors
Jack McBride
Haskell Boyter
Robert Coleman
E. A. Hungerford, Jr.
Vernon Bronson
William Harley
Richard A. Vogl
Robert Schenkkan
Edwin Adams
Prank E. Schooley
Gertrude Broderick
From: Burton Paulu
Upon returning today I learned that on Saturday,
May 16, John Schwarzwalder had a heart attack, and
Is confined to the hospital. I have no further
details on his condition, except that he is in a
"no visitors" status. He is not expected to return
to work until September at the earliest.
I have sent him the attached note*
BP:ds
